findings.title: Max Transaction
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet can only transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: Max Wallet
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet can only hold a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: Arbitrary Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change transaction fees, which may be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees.

findings.title: Low Severity Issue
findings.description: The smart contract has a low severity issue that may or may not create any functional vulnerability.

findings.title: Expected pragma, import directive or contract/interface/library definition
findings.description: Solc warning/error for syntax issues in the smart contract code.
